00226 inline uint16
00227 PointOfInterestItem::getNbrCategories() const
00228 {
00229    uint16 retVal = 0;
00230    for (uint32 i=0; i<getNbrGroups(); i++) {
00231       if ((getGroup(i) & 0x78000000) == 0x78000000)
00232          retVal++;
00233    }
00234    return (retVal);
00235 }
00236 
00237 inline uint32
00238 PointOfInterestItem::getCategory(uint16 i) const
00239 {
00240    uint32 retVal = MAX_UINT32;
00241    uint32 j = 0;
00242    int foundGroups = -1;
00243    while ( (j < getNbrGroups()) &&
00244            (retVal == MAX_UINT32) ) {
00245       if ((getGroup(j) & 0x78000000) == 0x78000000)
00246          foundGroups++;
00247       if (foundGroups == (int) i)
00248          retVal = getGroup(j);
00249      j++;
00250    }
00251    return (retVal);
00252 }
